Description

client-side Controller of player's actions, dispatch actions to methods (CLI-only)

server to client event triggered when the player wants to activate production

controller which handles the activateProductionScene
Board
Class Board represents the Board object of the game which contains the progress of Lorenzo faith points: the blackCross a List of solo Action to be used in the single player mode, for more:

Unit tests.
BoughtCardEvent
client to server event triggered when the player has bought a Development card
BoughtCardEventS2C
server to client event triggered when the player has bought a Development card

controller which handles the buyCardScene
CannotActivateProductionException
Exception thrown when you try to activate production, but you haven't enough resources for that production.
CannotBuyCardException
Exception thrown when you try to buy a Development Card, but you haven't enough space in the personal card board, or enough resources.
CardType
the color of the cards

DevelopmentCard
This class represents the type to assign at each card read from the json Card file

DevelopmentCardBoard contains the Board's cards from where the player can pick his choice

Unit tests.
DisconnectionException
 
EndGameEventS2C
serve to client event triggered when the game ends
EndGameSceneController
controller which handles the endGameScene
EndPreparationEventS2C
server to client event triggered when all the players have finished their initial choices it sends everyone's warehouse, together with everyone's Leader cards when this events is reached by the client, it means the "real" game starts and it's the first player's turn
EndTurnEvent
client to server event triggered when the player ends his turn
EventsHandler
Handles Server incoming Events and dispatch actions, it uses VISITOR PATTERN
EventsHandlerCLI
Implementation of ServerEventObserver interface, used for CLI only, to show messages based on received events (like the virtual view, or in the client)
EventsHandlerGUI
Handles Server incoming Events and dispatch actions, it uses VISITOR PATTERN.
FXMLController
abstract class from where all the Scene controllers are extended
Game
Game class contains the main logic of "Master of Renaissance", which is divided in several macro-areas.
GameSceneController
controller which handles the gameScene
GameStarterEventS2C
server to client event triggered when the game starts
GameTest
Unit tests.
GuiView
implementation of the View interface for the GUI
IllegalAction
LeaderCardDiscount class contains the illegal actions of the players
IllegalActionEventS2C
server to client event triggered when an illegal action happens
IllegalMarketUseException
Exception called when the player has discared resources he couldn't discard, or when the player has sent an invalid warehouse
IncrementPositionEventS2C
server to client event triggered when a player is moving his Faith track position
InitialChoiceEvent
client to server event triggered for the initial choice of Leader cards to be removed and resources to be put in the warehouse
InitialSceneController
controller which handles the initialScene
InvalidCardInsertionException
Exception called when you try to insert in the personal card board a card in a wrong position.
InvalidWarehouseInsertionException
Exception called when the insertion doesn't respect the warehouse rules, or the cell was already full.
LeaderActionSceneController
controller which handles the leaderActionScene
LeaderCard
LeaderCard class models the Leader cards and their attributes
LeaderCardActionEvent
client to server event triggered when the player has activated/discarded a Leader card
LeaderCardActionEventS2C
server to client event triggered when the current player has activated/discarded a Leader card and it is necessary to communicate it to every player
LeaderCardDiscount
LeaderCardDiscount class represents the Leader cards with special ability "Discount" when buying a Development card
LeaderCardProduction
LeaderCardProduction class represents the Leader cards with special ability "Production" which adds one production power
LeaderCardSlots
LeaderCardSlots class represents the Leader cards with special ability "Slots" which gives 2 special slots in which to put resources
LeaderCardTest
 
LeaderCardType
LeaderCardType class contains all the Leader cards special abilities
LeaderCardWhiteMarble
LeaderCardWhiteMarble class represents the Leader cards with special ability "White Marble" when taking resources from the market
LorenzoTurnEventS2C
server to client event triggered when it's Lorenzo's turn
MarbleColor
Colors of market matrix marbles
Market
Here lies the marble matrix logic, with initialization and player selection
MarketTest
Unit tests.
MastersOfRenaissance
The entrypoint of the MOR game.
NewConnectionEvent
client to server event triggered when a new player has connected
NewConnectionEventS2C
server to client event triggered when a new player has connected, it communicates the nickname (in fact it could have been edited in respect to the choice of the player) and if it's the first player or not
NewTurnEventS2C
server to client event triggered when a new turn happens
NumPlayerEvent
client to server event triggered when the first connected client chooses the number of players for the match
Pair<K,​V>
Contains a pail of values, useful for the Market choices ("r" (row) or "c" (column) is gonna be the first value, the selected row/column from the market is gonna be the second value)
PairTest
